text: Palestine summer time Is the time used in Palestine during several months of each year. It aims to early working hours and other public events; in order to get more time during the daytime hours, which gradually increase from the beginning of spring Until the climax summer, and shrink from this date until the peak of winter. The start and end times of Palestinian summer time: YEAR START END 2023 March 24 October 27 2024 March 29 October 24 == References == Category:Time zones Category:Geography of Palestine
title: Palestine Summer Time
